clumpy.metrics.log_score¶

clumpy.metrics.log_score(y_true, y_prob, a, b=1)¶

Log score

Parameters

  • y_true (array, shape (n_samples,)) – True targets.

  • y_prob (array, shape (n_samples,)) – Probabilities of the positive class.

  • sample_weight (ignored for now.) –

  • a (float) – log score parameter, computed with compute_a().

Returns

score – Log loss score

Return type

float

See also

clumpy.metrics.log_scorer()

To create a scorer.

clumpy.metrics.compute_a()

To compute the a parameter.

Previous topic

clumpy.metrics.compute_a

Next topic

clumpy.metrics.log_scorer
